description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 01 September 2020 (20/03649/FULL) which varied Condition 1 of planning permission dated 14 December 2019 (19/07325/FULL) for the amalgamation of Flats 1 and 2 on lower ground, raised ground floor and first floor level; Rebuilding of rear extension including provision of French doors onto existing rear ground floor terrace; Reconfiguration of existing lightwell areas and glazed roof over raised ground floor light well enclosure; Lowering of existing lower ground floor level including amendments to the approved internal layouts of the non-original extension at rear lower ground, raised ground and first floor levels, repositioning of approved rooflights at first floor and garden terrace and adjustment to the lightwell proportions; and amendments to the approved internal layouts of the non-original extension at rear lower ground, raised ground and first floor levels, repositioning of approved rooflights at first floor and garden terrace and adjustment to the lightwell proportions; NAMELY, to amend the height of the boundary party walls with Nos. 48 and 50 Ennismore Gardens to the rear terrace area, amendments to the French door arrangement to the rear of the property (raised ground floor level) and modifications to rooflights over approved rear lightwell area.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
